languages.text: "Наверное, с помощью этого..." {n}Идира прикасается к одной из трубок на своей голове.{/n} "Было больно, когда он ее надевал. И сейчас больно, но я привыкла немного. Это не главное, {name}, главное — что проклятая дверь на ту сторону захлопнулась! Я не слышу шепотков, мне не является будущее, меня не будят крики из преисподней и не нагоняют ужас видения грядущих кошмаров! Все... просто закончилось!"

"With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I'm used to it now. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"
languages.original_text: "Наверное, с помощью этого..." {n}Идира прикасается к одной из трубок на своей голове.{/n} "Было больно, когда он ее надевал. И сейчас больно, но я привыкла немного. Это не главное, {name}, главное — что проклятая дверь на ту сторону захлопнулась! Я не слышу шепотков, мне не является будущее, меня не будят крики из преисподней и не нагоняют ужас видения грядущих кошмаров! Все... просто закончилось!"

traits.locale_text: "With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I got used to it. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, don't need to shake in fear because I saw what nightmares I'm headed for! All of it just... stopped!"

"With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I got used to it. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, don't need to shake in fear because I saw what nightmares I'm headed for! All of it just... stopped!"

It still hurts but I got used to it. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and don't need to shake in fear because I saw what nightmares I'm headed for! All of it just... stopped!"

I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and don't need to shake in fear because I saw what nightmares I'm headed for! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"

"With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I'm used to it now. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"

languages.text: 「これがあれば…」{n}イディラは頭のチューブのひとつに触れる。{/n}「彼が装着するときは痛かった。まだ痛いけど、慣れたわ。{name}、問題は、向こう側への忌々しい扉が閉まったことよ！囁きを聞くことも、未来の幽霊を見ることも、苦しむ叫び声で目が覚めることも、待ち受ける恐怖のビジョンに苦しむこともない！何もかもただ…止まったのよ！」
languages.original_text: "With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I'm used to it now. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"

traits.locale_text: 「これがあれば…」{n}イディラは頭のチューブのひとつに触れる。{/n}「彼が装着するときは痛かった。まだ痛いけど、慣れたわ。{name}、問題は、向こう側への忌々しい扉が閉まったことよ！囁きを聞くことも、未来の幽霊を見ることも、苦しむ叫び声で目が覚めることもない。だって自分がどんな悪夢に向かっているのかが分かったから！何もかもただ…止まったのよ！」

languages.text: “我觉得，应该就是用了这个东西……”{n}伊迪拉摸了摸头上的管子。{/n}“戴上这个东西时候很疼，现在也很疼，不过我已经习惯了。最重要的是，那扇该死的门终于关上了，{name}！我再也不会听到窃窃私语，再也不会看到来自未来的幽灵，再也不会被折磨人的尖叫声吵醒，也再也不会被各种恐怖的幻景折磨！这一切……就这么消失了！”
languages.original_text: "With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I'm used to it now. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"

traits.locale_text: “我觉得，应该就是用了这个东西……”{n}伊迪拉摸了摸头上的管子。{/n}“戴上这个东西时候很疼，现在也很疼，不过我已经习惯了。最重要的是，那扇该死的门终于关上了，{name}！我再也不会听到窃窃私语，再也不会看到来自未来的幽灵，再也不会被折磨人的尖叫声吵醒，也再也不用因为看到了未来的噩梦而颤抖不已！这一切……就这么消失了！”

languages.text: «Con esto, creo...». {n}Idira toca uno de los tubos de su cabeza.{/n} «Dolió cuando me lo puso. Bueno, aún duele, pero me he acostumbrado. ¡Lo que importa es que ha cerrado del todo esa maldita puerta al otro lado, {name}! ¡Ya no oigo los susurros, no veo los fantasmas del futuro, no me despiertan los gritos atormentados y no me asedian visiones de los horrores que me esperan! ¡Ha puesto fin a todo!».
languages.original_text: "With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I'm used to it now. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"

traits.locale_text: «Con esto, creo...». {n}Idira toca uno de los tubos de su cabeza.{/n} «Dolió cuando me lo puso. Bueno, aún duele, pero me he acostumbrado. ¡Lo que importa es que ha cerrado del todo esa maldita puerta al otro lado, {name}! ¡Ya no oigo los susurros, no veo los fantasmas del futuro, no me despiertan los gritos atormentados y no tengo que temblar de miedo por las pesadillas que me esperan! ¡Ha puesto fin a todo!».

languages.text: "Ich glaube, damit ..." {n}Idira berührt eine der Röhren an ihrem Kopf.{/n} "Es hat wehgetan, als er es mir angelegt hat. Es tut immer noch weh, aber ich habe mich mittlerweile daran gewöhnt. {name}, wichtig ist nur, dass die verdammte Tür zur anderen Seite sich geschlossen hat! Ich höre das Flüstern nicht mehr, sehe die Geister der Zukunft nicht mehr. Ich werde nicht mehr von gequälten Schreien geweckt und ich werde nicht mehr von Visionen all der Schrecken geplagt, die mich erwarten! Es hat alles einfach ... aufgehört!"
languages.original_text: "With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I'm used to it now. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, damit ..." {n}Idira berührt eine der Röhren auf ihrem Kopf.{/n} "Es hat wehgetan, als er es mir angezogen hat. Es tut immer noch weh, aber ich habe mich daran gewöhnt. {name}, wichtig ist nur, dass die verdammte Tür zur anderen Seite sich geschlossen hat! Ich höre das Flüstern nicht mehr, ich sehe die Geister der Zukunft nicht mehr, ich werde nicht mehr von gequälten Schreien geweckt und ich muss nicht mehr vor Angst zittern, weil ich sehe, welche Albträume mich erwarten! Es hat alles einfach ... aufgehört!"

languages.text: « Avec ça, je crois, {n}répond Idira en effleurant l'un des tubes sur sa tête.{/n} J'ai eu mal quand il les a insérés. J'ai toujours mal, mais je m'y suis habituée. Ce qui compte, {name}, c'est que cette foutue porte de l'autre côté est bel et bien fermée ! Je n'entends plus les murmures, je ne vois plus les fantômes de l'avenir, je ne suis pas réveillée au milieu de la nuit par des hurlements tourmentés, et je ne suis plus tourmentée par les visions des horreurs qui m'attendent ! Tout ça... c'est fini ! »
languages.original_text: "With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I'm used to it now. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"

traits.locale_text: « Avec ça, je crois, {n}répond Idira en effleurant l'un des tubes sur sa tête.{/n} J'ai eu mal quand il les a insérés. J'ai toujours mal, mais je m'y suis habituée. Ce qui compte, {name}, c'est que cette foutue porte de l'autre côté est bel et bien fermée ! Je n'entends plus les murmures, je ne vois plus les fantômes de l'avenir, je ne suis pas réveillée au milieu de la nuit par des hurlements tourmentés, et je ne suis plus tourmentée par les visions des horreurs qui m'attendent ! Tout ça... c'est fini ! »

languages.text: "Şununla sanırım..." {n}İdira, başındaki tüplerden birine dokunuyor.{/n} "Takarken canım yandı. Hâlâ da acıtıyor ama artık alıştım. {name}, asıl önemli olan, öteki tarafa giden kapının kapalı olması! Artık fısıltı duymuyorum, geleceğin hayaletlerini görmüyorum, işkence çığlıklarıyla uyanmıyorum, beni bekleyen dehşetlerin görüleri de bana musallat olmuyor! Hepsi durdu!"
languages.original_text: "With this, I think..." {n}Idira touches one of the tubes on her head.{/n} "It hurt when he was putting it on. It still hurts, but I'm used to it now. {name}, what matters is that the damned door to the other side closed shut! I don't hear the whispers, don't see ghosts of the future, don't get woken up by tormented screams, and I'm not plagued by visions of the horrors that are waiting for me! All of it just... stopped!"

Hâlâ da acıtıyor ama artık alıştım. {name}, asıl önemli olan, öteki tarafa giden kapının kapalı olması! Artık fısıltı duymuyorum, geleceğin hayaletlerini görmüyorum, işkence çığlıklarıyla uyanmıyorum, beni bekleyen dehşetlerin görüleri de bana musallat olmuyor! Hepsi durdu!"
